PAD_StatueSight_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_StatueSight_0.text: Ketheric Thorm, shown in Selûnite armour. Is there any god that turncoat hasn't bowed to?

PAD_StatueSight_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_StatueSight_1.text: Ketheric Thorm, shown as loyal warrior of Selûne. Did Lady Shar embrace him, only to lose him...?
PAD_StatueSight_1.context: NodeContext: Some confusion. Referring to a statue of a man with multiple allegiances.

PAD_StatueSight_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_StatueSight_2.text: That statue... the man wears Selûnite armour and seals. A relic from an unholy age.
